SummaryEnglish: The Luolan Mansion, one of the five major mansions in the Great Summer Kingdom of the Divine Continent, is in decline due to the strange disappearance of its two masters. Although the young master Li Luo is superbly gifted and was born with three phase palaces, he struggles to cultivate due to his natural empty phase nature. On the other hand, Jiang Qing'e, to whom he was betrothed from childhood, has a ninth-grade bright phase and outstanding talent.
